projects.title: Movie Review
projects.bodyText:
- web-based movie review platform that Integrated with the IMDb API to fetch comprehensive movie data.
 - Users can seamlessly explore films, contribute their insightful reviews, and access user-generated critiques.

projects.title: News App
projects.bodyText:
- Created a News Aggregator mobile application using Java and Android Studio 
 -  Leveraged the News API to fetch and display recent news articles, ensuring efficient retrieval and display of over 300 articles separated by category .

projects.title: Chatbot App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that AI chatbot integrating OpenAIâ€™s API, allowing for natural language understanding to enable interactive and dynamic conversations
 - Implemented real-time message handling and Demonstrated proficiency in asynchronous programming, error handling,and API integration for a practical application.

projects.title: Book Management
projects.bodyText:
-  MVC-based CRUD Book Management System using Spring Boot Data JPA and MySQL, automating schema updates with Hibernate, and enabling efficient data management and retrieval.
 - Designed dynamic and user-friendly front-end interfaces with HTML, CSS, and Thymeleaf, ensuring a responsive user  experience and seamless interaction with the backend.

projects.title: Flappy Bird
projects.bodyText:
-  Java-based Flappy Bird game using the Swing library.
 - U Implemented game mechanics such as bird movement, column generation, collision detection, and scoring. 
 -.Utilized event listeners to handle user input from the mouse and space bar.

projects.title: Disney Plus Clone
projects.bodyText:
- A clone of Disney Plus, a popular streaming platform.
 - Designed and implemented a carousel to showcase featured content and utilized video cards to display various movie and TV show options.

projects.title: Student Records
projects.bodyText: - Program that serves as a record of students. Input is read in from a file and from there a user can perform various operations on it.

projects.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
projects.bodyText: - Tic Tac Toe is a classic two-player game where players take turns making X and O symbols in order to get three in arrow. This program allows you to play against the CPU.
